history.proof: intro H. hauto use: In_perm, Permutation_sym.

exceptions.tactic: apply perm_app; [apply perm_nil | apply perm_skip, perm_nil].

original: intro H. apply in_split in H. destruct H as [l1 [l2 H]]. exists (l1 ++ l2). rewrite H. apply perm_trans with (l1 ++ x :: l2). - apply perm_app; [apply perm_nil | apply perm_skip, perm_nil]. - apply perm_skip, perm_nil.
